directions: Beat eggs with a whisk.  Beat in sugar, milk, and salt.  Pour filling into pie crust.  Sprinkle nutmeg and cinnamon on top.
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 15 minutes.  Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for an additional 45 minutes.
title: Custard Pie I
